Summary: Product Management
Creator: mohamed dyaa

Summary: As a super admin, I want a Settings Page with options for appearance, language, security, and notifications, so that I can personalize my experience, increase security, and control how I receive alerts and updates.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *. Appearance Customization*

* *Feature:* {{Change Appearance}}
** Drop-down menu with:
*** Light Mode (default)
*** Dark Mode
** Selection changes the panel's theme immediately.
** Preference is stored in local storage or backend and *persists across sessions*.
** The currently selected appearance mode is *preselected* when revisiting the page.

----

h4. *2. Language Customization*

* *Feature:* {{Change Language}}
** Drop-down menu with:
*** English
*** Arabic
*** French
*** (Other languages as applicable)
** Changing the selection *dynamically updates all text* in the admin panel interface.
** Option is saved and used as the default on next login.

----

h4. *3. Security Settings*

* *Feature:* {{Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)}}
** Toggle button labeled ON/OFF.
** When enabled:
*** Prompts user to set up 2FA via QR code or input field for linking to a mobile app (e.g., Google Authenticator).
*** Displays confirmation:
✅ _"2FA has been successfully enabled."_
** When disabled:
*** Shows confirmation:
⚠️ _"2FA is currently disabled."_
** Future logins require:
*** Email + password
*** 6-digit code from authenticator app

----

h4. *4. Notification Preferences*

* *Feature:* {{Enable Notifications}} with individual toggles:
** *Mobile Push Notifications*:
*** ON/OFF toggle.
*** Enabled: Device will receive real-time alerts via app or browser.
** *Desktop Notifications*:
*** ON/OFF toggle.
*** Enabled: Browser will show pop-up notifications (must grant permission).
** *Email Notifications*:
*** ON/OFF toggle.
*** Enabled: Sends alerts to registered email for key events (e.g., user registration, transaction activity).

----

h4. *5. Visual Layout*

* The Settings Page UI includes *four distinct cards*, each with:
** *Title* (e.g., Appearance, Language, Security, Notifications)
** *Descriptive text* below each setting (e.g., “Choose your preferred theme.”)
** Clean, consistent layout with spacing and section dividers
* Responsive design for both desktop and tablet views

Summary: As a super admin, I want to view, search, filter, download, and manage all recorded payment transactions through a centralized Payments Tab, so that I can ensure transparency, traceability, and efficient handling of financial records.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* When the super admin clicks the *Payments Tab*, a *transaction table* is displayed with the following sortable columns:

||*Column*||*Details*||
|Transaction ID|Unique timestamp-based ID (e.g., 1698237823456); non-editable; sortable.|
|Customer Name|Full name of the customer; sortable.|
|Date|Transaction date & time (e.g., "November 27, 2024, 14:23:45"); sortable.|
|Type|Payment method: Credit Card or Cash; sortable.|
|Action|Buttons: {{View}}, {{Refund}}, {{Delete}}.|

----

h4. *2. Action Buttons Functionality*

* *View*:
** Displays detailed breakdown including:
*** Customer info
*** Amount paid
*** Payment method
*** Date/time
*** Processing log (e.g., transaction status updates)
* *Refund*:
** Initiates a refund request.
** Confirmation modal: _"Confirm refund for Transaction ID: TXID?"_
** On confirmation:
*** Marks transaction as "Refunded"
*** Logs the refund in system
* *Delete*:
** Prompts confirmation:
_"Are you sure you want to permanently delete this transaction?"_
** On confirmation deletes transaction and updates the table

----

h4. *3. Filtering Options*

* *Filter Button* (top-right corner):
** Opens a dropdown or modal with:
*** *Payment Type*:
**** Dropdown: All, Credit Card, Cash
*** *Date Range*:
**** Two date pickers for “From” and “To” dates
** On applying filter:
*** Table updates to show only relevant records
** If no match:
*** Show message: _"No transactions found for the selected criteria."_

----

h4. *4. Search Functionality*

* *Search Bar*:
** Positioned above the table
** Supports keyword search for:
*** *Transaction ID*
*** *Customer Name*
*** *Date (partial or full match)*

----

h4. *5. Download Feature*

* *Download Button*:
** Located next to Filter
** Opens pop-up with export options:
*** *PDF*: Formatted and printable transaction list
*** *Excel*: Tabular data export for accounting or audit use
** Downloaded file includes headers and all visible filtered data

----

h4. *6. Pagination & Record Display*

* Footer displays:
** *Pagination*:
*** Example: _"Page 1 of 10"_
*** Buttons: Next, Previous
** *Records per page*:
*** Dropdown: 10 (default), 20, 30, All
** *Record count*:
*** Example: _"Showing 10 of 100 transactions"_

Summary: As a super admin, I want to view, manage, add, filter, and export data of all branch admins and supervisors from a centralized interface, so that I can efficiently handle admin-related operations across different branch regions and roles.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *. Table Structure and Display*

* Upon clicking the *Admins Tab* from the sidebar, the system displays a *table* with the following *sortable* columns:

||*Column Name*||*Details*||
|Name|Full name of the admin or supervisor (sortable A-Z/Z-A).|
|Branch Region|Region to which the admin is assigned (e.g., Madinaty, Al-Rehab).|
|Email Address|Contact email of the admin (sortable).|
|Role|Admin role: Branch Manager, Assistant Manager, etc.|
|Action|Buttons: {{View}}, {{Edit}}, {{Delete}}.|

----

h4. *2. Action Buttons Functionality*

* *View*: Opens a modal or page showing:
** Full Name, Email, Phone Number
** Role and Assigned Branch
* *Edit*:
** Opens a pre-filled form to update the admin’s information.
** All changes saved reflect instantly in the table.
* *Delete*:
** Prompts a confirmation message:
_"Are you sure you want to delete this admin? This action cannot be undone."_
** On confirmation: deletes the admin and updates the view.

----

h4. *3. Filtering and Sorting*

* *Filter Button*:
** Located at the top-right of the table.
** Dropdowns available for:
*** *Branch Region*: Filters admins assigned to a selected region.
*** *Role*: Filters by admin roles (Branch Manager, Assistant Manager, etc.).
* *Clear Filter Option* appears when filters are applied.

----

h4. *4. Add Admin Feature*

* *Add Admin Button*:
** Located at the top-left of the card.
** Clicking opens a form with the following fields:

||*Field*||*Type*||*Required*||
|Full Name|Text|✅|
|Email Address|Text (email)|✅|
|Branch Region|Dropdown|✅|
|Role|Dropdown|✅|
|Phone Number|Text|Optional|
|Password|Password input|✅|

* *Submit*:
** Adds the new admin to the database.
** Table refreshes and displays the new record.
* *Cancel*:
** Discards the form and redirects to Admin Table view.

----

h4. *5. Download Feature*

* *Download Button*:
** Located beside the Filter button.
** Opens a pop-up window with format choices:
*** *PDF*: Clean layout for printing.
*** *Excel*: Tabular format for data processing.
* *Exported data includes*:
** Name, Email, Phone, Branch Region, Role.
** File is formatted professionally and includes headers.

----

h4. *6. Pagination and Record Controls*

* Footer includes:
** Text like: _"Showing 10 of 50 records"_
** Page navigation arrows: *Next*, *Previous*
** *Records per page* dropdown: 10 (default), 20, 30, All

Summary: As a super admin, I want to view, filter, and manage user records in a structured table format, so that super admin efficiently manages and access user data while maintaining usability and scalability for larger datasets.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* When the super admin clicks the *Users Tab* in the sidebar:
** A table is displayed containing the following columns:

||*Column Name*||*Details*||
|Username|Full name of the user, shown in plain text.|
|Mobile Number|Mobile number in valid local format (e.g., +20 123456789).|
|Email Address|Valid email format (e.g., [user@example.com|mailto:user@example.com]).|
|Address|Full address or region name (e.g., "Al-Rehab, Cairo").|
|Action|Icons or buttons: {{View}}, {{Edit}}, {{Delete}}.|

----

h4. *2. Action Functionality*

h5. - *View*

* Clicking "View" opens a detailed read-only page or modal displaying full user info.

h5. - *Edit*

* Clicking "Edit" opens a form to update user information.
* All fields should be pre-filled and editable.
* Saving updates the database and returns to the Users Table with a success message.

h5. - *Delete*

* Clicking "Delete" prompts a confirmation modal:
_"Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone."_
* If confirmed:
** User is deleted from the system.
** Table refreshes and reflects updated records.

----

h4. *3. Filtering Functionality*

* A *Filter Button* exists in the top-right corner of the card.
* When clicked, it displays a *dropdown list* of all available regions.
* Selecting a region filters the table to show users from that region only.
* A *"Clear Filter"* option appears after filtering to reset the table view.

----

h4. *4. Pagination and Record Display*

* The bottom of the table includes:
** Pagination controls showing:
*** Current page number: e.g., *Page 2 of 5*
*** Arrows for "Next" and "Previous" navigation.
** *Rows per page dropdown* with options:
*** 10 users (default)
*** 20 users
*** 30 users
*** All users (displays all in one view)

Summary: As a super admin, I want to review the entered product details in a read-only format before final submission, so that I can confirm the accuracy of the information and reduce data entry errors.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *. Navigation to the Review Page*

* When the super admin clicks *"Add"* on the *Add New Product* form (FR8), the system navigates to a *Review Product Details Page*.
* All previously entered product details are displayed in a *read-only format*, including:

||*Field*||*Format on Review Page*||
|Product Name|Plain text|
|Product Category|Plain text (e.g., "Seafood")|
|Price|"LE [amount]" (e.g., "LE 75.00")|
|Quantity|"[number] units"|
|Discount|Display as entered with the correct format:
* "15%" if percentage
* "LE 10.00" if fixed|
|HSN Code|6-digit code|
|Status|"In Stock" / "Out of Stock" with colored tag|
|Upload Photo|Thumbnail image preview of uploaded file|

----

h4. *2. Data Display Rules*

* All values must exactly match what the super admin entered on the previous page.
* If a discount is {{0}}, display as:
_"Discount: None"_
or
_"Discount: LE 0.00"_

----

h4. *3. Action Buttons and Their Behavior*

h5.  - *Confirm Button*

* Label: *"Confirm"*
* On click:
** Saves the product permanently to the system database.
** Redirects the super admin to the *Products Table page (FR7)*.
** Displays a success toast/message:
_"Product added successfully."_

h5. - *Back Button*

* Label: *"Back"*
* On click:
** Returns the user to the *Add New Product* form.
** All previously entered data remains pre-filled for editing.
** No data is lost or reset unless the page is refreshed.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to access a detailed form to add a new product to the system, so that I can ensure all product data is correctly entered and categorized for future display and management.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *Accessing the Add New Product Page*

* When the super admin clicks the *"Add New Product"* button from the Products table (FR7):
** The system navigates to the *Add Product view*.
** A *breadcrumb* is displayed at the top:
**Products > Add New Product*

----

h4. *2. Form Fields Displayed*

The form must include the following fields with associated validations:

||*Field*||*Type*||*Validation/Behavior*||
|Product Name|Text input|Required. Cannot be empty.|
|Product Category|Dropdown|Options: Seafood, Salads, Meats, Veggies, Fruits. Required.|
|Price|Numeric input|Required. Must be a positive number.|
|Quantity|Numeric input|Required. Must be a positive integer.|
|Discount|Numeric input|Optional. Defaults to {{0}} if left blank.|
|Discount Format|Dropdown/Toggle|Select between *Percentage (%)* or *Fixed Amount (EGP LE)*.|
|HSN|Numeric input|Required. Must be exactly 6 digits.|
|Status|Dropdown|Options: *In Stock* or *Out of Stock*. Required.|
|Upload Photo|File input (drag/drop or button)|Accepts {{.jpeg}} or {{.png}}. Required.|

* Validation errors must be displayed inline if any required field is empty or invalid.

----

h4. *3. File Upload Requirements*

* File upload must:
** Accept only {{.jpeg}} and {{.png}} formats.
** Show a preview thumbnail after upload.
** Allow re-upload (replace existing file).
** Display an error message for unsupported formats.

----

h4. *4. Action Buttons and Behavior*

* *Add* button:
** Enabled only when all required fields are filled and valid.
** On click:
*** Submits the form.
*** Adds the product to the database.
*** Redirects the super admin back to the *Products page (FR7)*.
*** Shows a success message:
_"Product added successfully."_
* *Cancel* button:
** On click:
*** Discards all form input.
*** Redirects the super admin back to the *Products page (FR7)*.
*** No product is added.

----

h4. *5. Default Behaviors*

* If the *Discount* field is left empty:
** The system sets it to {{0}}.
* If a *discount value* is entered:
** A *discount format* (either {{%}} or {{EGP}}) *must be selected*, else the Add button is disabled.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to view, filter, search, delete, and manage all product details from a centralized table, so that I can maintain product availability, pricing, and stock status efficiently.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *. Table Display*

* Upon selecting "Products" from the sidebar:
** A *Products Table* is displayed, showing 10 products by default.
** Table includes the following columns:
*** *Product Name* – name of the product.
*** *Price* – in the applicable currency (e.g., {{LE 25.00}}).
*** *Quantity* – shows the currently available quantity.
*** *Status* – colored tags:
**** *In Stock* – green.
**** *Out of Stock* – red.
*** *Action* – includes:
**** *View*: opens a detailed view.
**** *Edit*: opens editable fields/form.
**** *Delete*: triggers a confirmation before deletion.
*** *Search Bar*:
**** Located above the table.
**** Allows the super admin to search for specific products by name.
**** *Filter Options*:
**** Multi-select dropdowns to filter by:
***** Product category (fish, meat, salads..)
***** Price range.
***** Status (In Stock, Out of Stock).
*** *Add New Product Button:*
**** A clearly labeled *"Add New Product"* button is placed above or near the table.
*** *Footer Features*
**** *Pagination Summary*:
***** Displayed at the bottom of the table.
***** Shows format:
_"Showing 10 out of 150 products"_ (values update dynamically).
**** *Rows Per Page Dropdown*:
***** Options include: 10 (default), 20, 30, All.
***** Selecting an option updates the number of visible rows accordingly.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to view, edit, and delete customer orders from a centralized table on the dashboard so that to track, manage, and act on orders efficiently through a centralized interface.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. Acceptance Criteria

An *Orders Card* is displayed on the dashboard, showing a structured table.

* The table includes the following columns for each order:
** *Order ID* – displays a 6-digit unique order number (e.g., {{908765}}).
** *Date* – formatted as {{DD/MM/YYYY}} or based on system localization settings.
** *Customer Name* – displays full name of the customer.
** *Amount* – shows order total in correct currency (e.g., {{LE100.00}}).
** *Status* – visually represented with colored tags:
*** *Pending* – yellow tag.
*** *Canceled* – red tag.
*** *Delivered* – green tag.
* *Action:*
** Provides the following options as clickable buttons or icons:
*** *View:* Opens a detailed view of the selected order.
*** *Edit:* Allows modification of order details.
*** *Delete:* Deletes the selected order after confirmation via a pop-up.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to filter overall dashboard data by time period and download reports in Excel or PDF formats, so that I can analyze and archive business performance metrics efficiently.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *1. Time Filter Dropdown*

* A dropdown labeled *"This Month"* is displayed at the top-right corner of the dashboard.
* The dropdown includes the following filter options:
** *Current Month*
** *Previous Month*
** *Current Quarter*
** *Current Year*
* When a filter is selected:
** All dashboard cards (stats, charts, tables) update accordingly.
** The selection remains active until the user changes it.

h4. *2. Download Report Functionality*

* A *"Download Report"* button is displayed next to the "This Month" dropdown.
* When clicked:
** A pop-up appears with file format options:
*** *Excel*
*** *PDF*
* Once a format is selected:
** The system generates a downloadable report.
** The report includes:
*** Revenue and order summaries.
*** Charts (bar and pie).
*** Regional breakdowns.
*** Statistical KPIs.
** The layout of the report is:
*** Professionally formatted.
*** Easy to read (tables, charts properly aligned).
*** Labeled with the selected time filter period (e.g., “Report – July 2025”).
* The report downloads initiates automatically after generation.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to view revenue trends across the week and analyze order distribution by region, so that I can understand business performance over time and across different areas to make informed decisions.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
h4. *1. Revenue Overview Card*

* A bar chart is displayed showing daily revenue from *Sunday to Friday*.
** Each bar corresponds to a day of the week.
** Daily revenue values are clearly labeled.
* Below the bar chart, a table is shown with the following columns:
** *Region* – e.g., Madinaty, Al-Rehab.
** *Orders* – Total number of orders from that region.
** *Revenue* – Total revenue generated from that region.
* A *"View All"* option is available to expand the table and show all regions (not just top entries).

h4. *2. Orders by Region Card*

* A *pie chart* is displayed to visualize the percentage distribution of orders by region.
* A *dropdown filter* is positioned above the chart with the following time options:
** Current month
** Previous month
** Current quarter
** Current year
* The chart updates dynamically when the dropdown filter selection changes.

h4. *3. General Display Requirements*

* Both cards appear on the *dashboard page* beneath the statistical results from FR3.
* All data (charts and tables) are populated dynamically from real-time or periodically refreshed backend sources.
* The layout is responsive and accessible on both desktop and tablet screens.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to see summarized statistical data on revenue, products, and orders displayed in clearly separated cards below the welcome message, so that I can quickly assess the current performance of the platform across all branches.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* *Statistical Cards Visibility*
** Three rectangular cards are displayed below the welcome text:
*** Total Revenue
*** Total Products
*** Total Orders
* *Total Revenue Card*
** Shows the total combined revenue across all branches.
** Displays an upward or downward arrow indicating revenue trend (compared to previous data).
** Shows the last update date in the format:
{{"Update: [Month Day, Year]"}}
e.g., {{Update: November 10, 2024}}
* *Total Products Card*
** Shows the current total number of products across all branches.
** Displays an upward or downward arrow indicating the product count trend.
** Includes the same date format for the last update.
* *Total Orders Card*
** Displays the total number of orders from all branches.
** Includes trend indication (increase/decrease) using arrows.
** Shows last update date as per the specified format.
* *General Requirements*
** Data reflects real-time or most recent information.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to access a well-structured dashboard upon login so that I can manage all administrative features in an organized and intuitive interface.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* After a successful sign-in, the super admin is redirected to the dashboard page.
* The left sidebar is visible and includes:
** Gazara logo at the top.
** Vertically listed tabs: Dashboard (active by default), Orders, Users, Admins, Payments, Settings.
** A toggle button to switch between dark and light modes.
* The center panel displays:
** A search bar at the top center to search for items or data.
** A profile section on the top right showing:
*** Super admin's profile picture.
*** Super admin's name beside the picture.
** A notification icon or menu next to the profile picture that shows alerts or messages.
** Below the search bar, a welcome text appears with:
*** Dynamic time-based greeting ("Good morning", "Good afternoon", "Good evening").
*** Super admin's name (e.g., “Good evening, Ahmed”).
* The design is responsive and consistent with the app’s theme.
* Sidebar navigation changes the active view accordingly without full page reload.

Summary: As a super admin, I want to securely log in to the system using my email and password so that I can access administrative functions safely and efficiently.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The sign-in page displays the Gazara logo at the top, followed by a welcome message.
* An input field is provided for the email, which accepts only standard email format (e.g., [example@domain.com|mailto:example@domain.com]).
* An input field is provided for the password, which is masked by default.
* A “Remember Me” checkbox is available and functional.
* A “Forgot Password” link is shown below the password field.
* A “Sign In” button is available and becomes clickable only when both fields are filled.
* Invalid login attempts show an appropriate error message (e.g., "Incorrect email or password").
* On successful login, the user is redirected to the Super Admin Dashboard.
* Credentials are hard-coded by the developer as part of initial setup.

Summary: As a user, I want to view and edit my personal information from my profile page so that I can keep my details up to date and accurate.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Users can access the profile page via the navigation bar.
* The profile page displays: full name, phone number, location (governorate and area), default payment method, and profile picture.
* Each field is editable using an "Edit" or pencil icon.
* Users can upload or change their profile picture from their device.
* Changes can be saved or discarded.
* A confirmation message appears after a successful update.

Summary: As a user, I want to explore a wide variety of random grocery items on a dedicated Explore page so that I can discover new or featured products outside the main categories.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The Explore page is accessible via the navigation bar.
* The page displays a dynamic list of random or featured grocery items.
* The list refreshes or changes periodically or on scroll.
* Users can tap any item to view its details.

Summary: As a user, I want to view my list of favorite items and have the ability to add all of them to my cart so that I can quickly purchase my preferred products.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* A “Favorites” section/page is accessible from the navigation bar.
* The favorites list displays item name, image, price.
* A prominent “Add All to Cart” button is available and adds all listed items to the cart.
* Users can remove items from the favorites list.
* If the list is empty, a message like “You have no favorite items yet” is displayed with a call-to-action to browse products.

Summary: As a user, I want to view all items in my cart along with the total cost so that I can review and finalize my order before proceeding to checkout.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The cart page displays all added items with:
** Item name, image, quantity, and price.
* A “Total Cost” section is shown at the bottom.
* Users can edit item quantities or remove items directly from the cart.
* A “Proceed to Checkout” button is available and functional.
* If the cart is empty, a message like “Your cart is empty” is displayed along with a link/button to return to shopping.

Summary: As a user, I want to add items to my cart from the home page so that I can select quantity and manage my product preferences easily.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Users can select an item directly from the home page.
* A product detail modal or page opens showing:
** Quantity selection (from 1 kg to 12 kg).
** An “Add to Cart” button.
** A “Favorite” (heart) icon to add the item to favorites.
** A rating interface (e.g., stars) to submit a rating.
* The quantity selector enforces a max limit of 12 kg.
* Clicking “Add to Cart” adds the selected quantity to the user's cart.
* Confirmation is displayed upon successful addition to the cart.

Summary: As a mobile user, I want a navigation bar on the home page so that I can easily access the main sections of the app.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The navigation bar appears at the bottom of the home page.
* The bar includes five icons: *Shop*, *Explore*, *Cart*, *Favorite*, and *Profile*.
* Each icon is labeled clearly and represents its respective function visually.
* Tapping an icon navigates the user to the corresponding section.
* The currently active section is highlighted.

Summary: As a logged-in mobile user, I want to access a personalized home page so that I can view offers, search for groceries, and feel welcomed by the app.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Upon successful login or signup, the user is directed to the home page.
* The top of the page displays a welcome message including the user’s first name (e.g., “Welcome, Sarah!”).
* A search bar is present and allows users to input keywords for grocery items.
* As the user types in the search bar, auto-suggestions based on input appear in real-time.
* Below the search bar, a “Today’s Offers” section is clearly visible.
* “Today’s Offers” displays a list/grid of promotional items with price and short description.

Summary: As a mobile user who has forgotten their password, I want to receive a reset link via email so that I can set a new password and regain access to my account.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* A “Forgot Password?” link is available on the login page and redirects to a reset page.

* The reset page includes an input field to enter the user’s email address.
* Upon submitting a valid email, a confirmation message is shown, and a reset link is sent to the user’s email.
* Clicking the link opens a secure password reset page.
* The reset page includes two input fields: “New Password” and “Confirm Password.”.
* If both fields match and are valid, the password is reset, and the user is redirected to the login screen.
* If passwords do not match or are invalid, an appropriate error message is displayed.

Summary: As a returning mobile user, I want to log in using my email and password so that I can access my account and continue using the app.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* A login page is available with input fields for email and password.
* Users can enter their credentials and tap a “Login” button.
* If the credentials are correct, the user is logged in and redirected to the home or relevant page.
* If the credentials are incorrect, an error message is displayed (e.g., “Invalid email or password”).
* A “Forgot Password?” link is available and navigates to the password recovery process.
* A “Don’t have an account? Sign up” link is available and navigates to the sign-up flow.

Summary: As a mobile user, I want to select my location by choosing my government and area from dropdowns so that the app can determine my delivery zone.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Two dropdowns are visible: one for “Your Government” and one for “Your Area.”.
* Users must select a value from both dropdowns to proceed.
* A “Submit” button finalizes the selections and saves the location.
* A functional “Back” button is present starting from this screen and navigates to the previous step.

Summary: As a mobile user, I want to enter a four-digit OTP code to verify my mobile number so that I can proceed with account registration.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The user sees an input for a four-digit OTP after entering their mobile number.
* Four-digit OTP code is sent to the user mobile phone messages
* OTP is validated on entry; incorrect codes show an error message
* A “Resend Code” button is available.
* The code resets every 90 seconds automatically and users are notified when it does.

Summary: As a mobile user, I want to enter my mobile number and see the correct country flag based on the country code so that I can provide my contact info for verification.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* A phone number input field is available.
* Entering a country code shows the corresponding country flag.
* Input accepts only valid numeric characters.
* Submitting an empty or invalid number displays an error.

Summary: As a (Mobile) new user, I want to sign up using Google or Facebook so that I can register quickly without creating a new account manually.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The sign-up page displays “Continue with Google” and “Continue with Facebook” buttons.
* Clicking either button initiates the respective social login flow.
* Successful login redirects the user to the onboarding or home page.
* If the user denies access or login fails, an appropriate error message is displayed.

Summary: Onboarding
Creator: mohamed dyaa

Summary: As a mobile user, I want to see a welcome page with a "Get Started" button when I open the app so that I can begin using the application easily.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The app displays a welcome page on first launch.
* The welcome page includes a clearly visible “Get Started” button.
* Tapping “Get Started” takes the user to the next step in the onboarding or home flow.

Summary: As a user, I want to view and update my personal information so that I can keep my account details accurate.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Page shows name, phone, address, city, zip.
* Users can edit and save or discard changes.

Summary: As a user, I want to add multiple addresses so that I can choose a delivery location at checkout.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* “Add New Address” button available on the address page.
* New address form includes: street, house number, floor, phone.

Summary: As a user, I want to view my past orders so that I can see order details and re-order if needed.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Orders list includes: date, total price, recipient, delivery day.
* Each order has “Buy Again” and “View Item” options.

Summary: As a user, I want a drop-down menu when I click my profile icon so that I can quickly access my account options.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Drop-down includes: My Orders, My Wallet, My Account, Logout.
* Each option navigates to its relevant page.

Summary: As a user, I want to receive item suggestions while typing in the search bar so that I can find products faster.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Real-time suggestions appear based on partial input.
* Suggestions update as the user types.
* Clicking a suggestion leads to the item page or search results.

Summary: As a user, I want to apply a promo code in my cart so that I can receive discounts before checking out.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* A promo code field is available in the cart page.
* Valid codes apply a discount and show updated totals.
* Invalid codes show an error message.

Summary: As a user, I want to add a note to each item in my cart so that I can include special instructions (e.g., “no onions”).
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Each cart item has a “Add Note” field.
* Notes can be typed and saved.
* Notes are shown in the cart and passed with the order.

Summary: As a user, I want to adjust the quantity of each item in my cart and also remove any item from my cart so that I can update my order before checkout and eliminate products I no longer want to purchase
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* users able to add or subtract quantities of each item they have added.
* Quantity updates reflect in real-time without reloading the page.
* Price updates accordingly when quantity is changed.
* A delete/trash icon is available for each cart item.
* Clicking the icon removes the item from the cart.
* Total price updates after item removal.

Summary: As a user, I want to place my order and complete the payment after entering valid payment details so that my order can be successfully processed and confirmed.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The “Place Order” button becomes active *only when* all required payment fields are valid
* When payment is processed successfully:
** The user is redirected to an *Order Confirmation Page*.
** A success message is shown:
**“Your order has been placed successfully!”*

*Failed Transaction Handling (Card Payment):*

* If payment fails:
** A clear error message is shown (e.g., *“Payment could not be processed. Please check your card details or try again.”*).
** The user remains on the same screen with previously entered data retained.

Summary: As a user, I want to choose between cash on delivery or paying by card during checkout so that I can use my preferred payment method.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Two clearly labeled options must be displayed:
** *Cash on Delivery*
** *Pay by Card*
* Users can only select cash on delivery if they have previously completed at least one order by card.
* For card payments, users must enter the card number, name on the card, expiry date, and security code.
* *For card Number:*
** Must be a numeric string with 16 digits.
** Accepted card types (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) should be detected and displayed dynamically based on the first 4 digits.
** Should pass *Luhn’s Algorithm* for credit card number validation.
** Display the input as "**** **** **** 1234" for security.
* *Name on Card*
** Must be a non-empty string.
** Allowed characters: alphabets (A-Z, a-z), spaces, and hyphens.
** Minimum length: 2 characters.
** Maximum length: 50 characters.
** *Error Messages:*
*** "Name cannot be empty. Please enter the name exactly as it appears on your card."
*** "Invalid characters detected. Please use letters, spaces, or hyphens only."
* *Expiry Date*
** Format: MM/YY.
** Must be a valid future date.
** Month (MM) should range from 01 to 12.
** Year (YY) should not be in the past.
** Automatically format the input as "MM/YY" as the user types.
** *Error Messages:*
*** "Invalid expiry date. Please use MM/YY format."
*** "Expiry date cannot be in the past."
*** "Month must be between 01 and 12."
* 
* *Security Code (CVV)*
** Must be a numeric string with 3 or 4 digits (depending on the card type).
** Only numbers are allowed.
** Mask input as "***" for security.
** *Error Messages:*
*** "Invalid CVV. Please enter a 3 or 4-digit security code."
* *Card type logo*
** users enter the first four digits of their card number, the card type (e.g., Visa, Mastercard) should display dynamically within the card number field.

Summary: As a user, I want to enter my delivery details during checkout so that my order can be accurately processed and delivered to the correct location.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The checkout page must contain clearly labeled and required fields for:
** First Name (alphabets only)
** Last Name (alphabets only)
** Phone Number (Egyptian number format or international)
** Address (text field)
** Region (drop-down selection)
** Postal Code (numbers only)
* Each field should display a validation message if left empty or incorrectly formatted.
** Example: "Phone number is required" or "Postal code must contain only numbers."
* *"Save and Continue"* button should:
** Validate and save the input.
** Redirect the user to the next step (e.g., payment).
* Users see a summary of the details with an option to edit them if needed after saving delivery information.

Summary: As a user, I want a "View Cart" button to appear in the side notification after adding an item, so that I can immediately review or modify my cart items.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The side pop-up notification must include a *"View Cart"* button, clearly visible and styled as a clickable element.
* Clicking *"View Cart"* should:
** Redirect the user to the *Cart Page*.
** Ensure all items added are accurately displayed in the cart.
* If the cart is empty (in case of unexpected error), the redirection should show a message like *“Your cart is currently empty”*.

Summary: As a user, I want a side notification to appear when I add an item to my cart so that I receive instant confirmation of the item being added, along with its details.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* clicking the "Add to Cart" button on an item, a side pop-up (toast notification or slide-in) appears on the screen.
* Notification appears on the *right side* of the screen (or per design layout).

Summary: As a user I want to sign up via Google, Facebook, or email So that to provide flexible and convenient registration options
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The sign-up page must display three options:
** *Continue with Google*
** *Continue with Facebook*
** *Sign up with email*
* Clicking Google or Facebook initiates the corresponding OAuth flow.
* 

*Field Verification for Email Signup:*

* First Name: Required; accepts alphabets only.
* Last Name: Required; accepts alphabets only.
* Email: Required; valid email format.
* Password: Required; minimum 8 characters, must include numbers and letters.

Summary: As a non-logged-in user, I want to be prompted to log in before I can add items to the cart, view my cart, or proceed to checkout so that my actions are tied to my account for a secure and personalized shopping experience.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* A non-logged-in user clicks “Add to Cart,” a login/signup prompt appears.
* The user is redirected to the login/signup page.
* After successful login, the user returns to the original item page.
* A non-logged-in user clicks “Proceed to Check out,” they are redirected to login/signup first.

Summary: As a user i want to see Shop Now button at the home page that redirects to the "Shop All" page So that I can easily start shopping
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description: * Clicking on "Shop Now" button redirects the user to the "Shop All" page.

Summary: As a user I want to see images of random recommended items as I scroll down the home page so that I can discover new or popular products I might be interested in.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* Images of random recommended items display at the end of home page
* Images of random recommended items contain showcasing popular or curated items.
* Clicking on an item navigates the user to that item's detail page.

Summary: As a user I want to see "Home", "Vegetables," "Fruits," "Meat," and "Shop All." on the third bar So that it can be easy access to key sections of the website for smooth browsing.
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The third bar contains the main navigation links: "Home", "Vegetables," "Fruits," "Meat," and "Shop All."
* The "Home" link is bolded when the user is on the homepage.
* The navigation bar and its links are fully visible and usable on different screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop).

* Clicking on 
** “*Vegetables*” display all vegetable items, including details such as price, weight, image, and name.
**  "*Fruits*" display all fruit items, including details such as price, weight, image, and name.
**  "*Meat*" displays all meat items, including details such as price, weight, image, and name.
**  "*Shop All*" display a combined list of all available items across categories in one place.

Summary: As a user I want to see the logo, a search bar, and account access options (Signup/Login) on the second top bar So that I can recognize the brand, search for products, and easily access or create my account
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The *brand logo* is displayed on the *left side* of the second top bar.
* A *search bar* is positioned in the *center* of the bar and allows text input with suggestions (if applicable).
* *"Signup/Login" buttons* are present on the *right side*, visible and clickable.
* The entire layout is *responsive* and adapts well to different screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop).
* Clicking the logo *redirects to the home page*.
* The search bar allows input and displays *relevant results or suggestions*.

Summary: As a User I want a promotional message displayed in the center of the top bar So that I can be aware of current deals and promotions
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* promotional message appears in the center of the top bar.
* The message is *accurate*, *up-to-date*, and *aligned with active promotions*.
* the text is correct and is clearly visible and readable across different screen sizes.

Summary: As a User I want to reach "About, Contact, and Find Us" Buttons So that It provides learning more about the brand, contacting support, and the business locations
Creator: mohamed dyaa
Description:
* The "About Us, Contact, Find Us" buttons are present on the top bar of the home page.
* Each button is *clearly labeled* and *clickable*.
* Clicking on:
** *"About Us"* opens the page with brand information.
** *"Contact"* opens a page with support options (e.g., form, phone, email).
** *"Find Us"* opens a map or list of store locations.
